name: Cobi Treasure Deluxe
description: Help Sally the seahorse collect and match ocean treasures before they fall to the seabed. Match the falling ocean gems and play through three exciting and absorbing game modes in the perfect blend of relaxation and Match 3 fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 1.0 GHz or Better Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0

reviews.review_text: Painfully simple match three game. The nautical theme feels more like a level on a deeper game but it never changes. There are three game modes each of which start out simple and slow and progressivly get faster while also introducing items that make it more difficult to make matches.

The game is simple but the controls are very senseable. Game starts off in a slow pace and starts to speed up. It is fun but it will get boring quick. game needs achievements and some kind of versus's mode. That would be pretty cool to have
Get this on sale and it's not bad. But not a new shiny super cool type bubble pop game. Not dynamic what so ever.  For cheep as in half a buck, it's fun.

YAM3 (Yet Another Match 3)  Pro: Good looking Some variations Simple concept F12 works Inexpensive or in bundles  Con: It's a match 3 game Basically a facebook game No cards / achievement  Overall: 5/10 (-1 gets boring really fast since it's a match 3 game) = 4/10 If you like match 3 games get it, if you get it in a bundle try it out. Otherwise pass. Voted up as it's a good match 3 game (which isn't saying much)
simple game, just a friendly version of tetris.  0/10: 5
